name: @three.ez/view-manager
description: Internal package that manages data and interactions with rendered views.
author: agargaro

scripts.publish-beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta --git-tag-version false && npx webpack && cd publish && npm publish --tag beta --access public
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch --git-tag-version false && npx webpack && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor --git-tag-version false && npx webpack && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-major: npm version major --git-tag-version false && npx webpack && cd publish && npm publish --access public
